title: Bug 114470[Smoke]Error message throws when using new Date("3/2/2005") as value in table filter.
OB: Filter does not work properly when using new Date("3/2/2005") as a value in the table filter.
EB: When saving and previewing the report, the filter should work without any errors. However, there are errors on the report page. The error message states: "There are error(s) in Table: table8. Error 0: data.engine.DataConversionError (1 time(s)). Detail: An error occurred in data type conversion. Cannot convert it to Date. Cannot convert it to Date."
SR:
1. Open the report with the table filter.
2. Use the value new Date("3/2/2005") in the table filter.
3. Save the report.
4. Preview the report.
5. Observe the error message and verify that the filter is not working as expected.
